entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:28 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -36.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 2:25 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -36.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -40.3°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
